An Indianapolis Catering Company

Indy Fresh Catering is a local full-service catering company that prepares fresh meals with fresh ingredients every day. Our menu was designed to cater to any event. Indy Fresh Catering delivers to all of Central Indiana. We are proud to be your hometown, local catering company delivering fresh made to order food every day.

MENU

PACKAGES

EVENTS

FREE DELIVERY! FREE DELIVERY! FREE DELIVERY!

SMART

Indy Fresh has no brick and mortar restaurant headaches. Indy Fresh does one thing and we do it well. We make incredible food. We are a commercial kitchen that creates classic dishes with passion and that is how we pass the value onto you. Indy Fresh splurges where it counts. We use only high quality, fresh ingredients. We save, you save and your client or guest will be blown away. We can cater your wedding shower for 15 or your corporate event for 500. We have menu groupings to fit any diet, budget and event. Who doesn’t love Italian food anyway?

LOCAL

Indy Fresh is the American dream. We know and love our customers. You cannot get this food in Dallas and Denver. Indy Fresh is nothing like that “unlimited salad and breadsticks place.” We do not have a Monday shipment of meatballs delivered to our back door from your national food service company. We offer a unique, midwest mid- west experience. We do it here in our kitchen just like your fun-loving grandmother did minus the unsolicited advice.

SMART

Remember the mystery meat in your grade school cafeteria? Ever wonder why the restaurant catering order doesn’t quite measure up to your plate in the restaurant? There is a difference between cooking pasta for 2 and pasta for 200. Catering is all we do at Indy Fresh and we have literally “aeronautically engineered” catering. We can transition from kitchen to venue like non-other thanks to our Award Winning Chef Scott Vogel, the “engineer” of Midwest Italian and Comfort Food.

OVER 1,000,000 HAPPY GUESTS

With over 50,000 events under our belt, Indy Fresh has greater Indianapolis catering down to perfection. Whether it is business or pleasure, you can breathe easy. The only extra thing you will need on your plate is our versatile, fresh food. With Indy Fresh, you will be asking for seconds with our smart and fair pricing. Start by exploring our expansive menus to select the perfect meal then email us or give us a call anytime!

COMMUNITY PARTNERS

Indy Fresh Catering loves to help our local Indianapolis communities and businesses. Indy Fresh Catering is proud to give our time and service to our local community. Indy Fresh loves to see local businesses (like us) thrive on our community.
